1592200.name: EXP: War Trauma
1592200.description:
Attention: This game has high psychological terror and scares, not recommended for people with heart conditions. By playing, you accept the above term and are on your own.

GAMEPLAY


This demo has a loop gameplay system which does not represents the full game.

You are completely helpless, your only weapon is your intelligence. Explore a mysterious and strange apartment, solve riddles, and most important of all, when the countdown starts, be quick. The full version of the game will feature scenarios from WW2 with unique mechanics.

NARRATIVE


EXP: War Trauma has a fictional story, inspired by some historical facts from World War II.

You are Krieger, a traumatized WW2 soldier, as you progress through the experience, you will discover more about his history, his traumas, and what happened to him.

EXP MEANING


"EXP" stands for "Experience" which marks the beginning of a series of games, with different themes, with the first being "War Trauma".

It's time for you to... Experience: War Trauma

SOCIALS:



  • TWITTER

  • YOUTUBE

  • DISCORD COMMUNITY

FEATURES:



  • Puzzle Solving
  • Investigation
  • Intense Psychological Horror
1592200.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
